title: COAST ORB / seagull
description: There is a seagull flying somewhere along the coast. The area there should have an afterthought orbital.

dialogueTree.title: Endurance: "You see that seagull up there? Remi..."
dialogueTree.text: You see that seagull up there? Remind you of anybody?

links.title: You: "No one comes to mind."
links.text: No one comes to mind.

links.title: Endurance: "You! You and the seagull are just a..."
links.text: You! You and the seagull are just alike!

links.title: You: "Why am I like a seagull?"
links.text: Why am I like a seagull?

links.title: Endurance: "Think about the seagull's story. It..."
links.text: Think about the seagull's story. It's one of endurance -- and adaptation. The seaside was paradise once. They were birds of that paradise.

links.title: Endurance: "Then their paradise became *shit ci..."
links.text: Then their paradise became *shit city*. And what did they do? They became urban survivors! Eating burgers out of trash cans! Killing and eating pigeons!

links.title: Endurance: "No time for that sentimental bullsh..."
links.text: No time for that sentimental bullshit. They're hustlers, getting shit done. They're one pair of track pants away from gangsters. Just like you.

links.title: You: "Hold on. Have I ever eaten a burger..."
links.text: Hold on. Have I ever eaten a burger out of the trash?

links.title: Endurance: "You have. The body remembers."
links.text: You have. The body remembers.

links.title: You: "Fuckin' right. Whatever it takes to..."
links.text: Fuckin' right. Whatever it takes to survive. I AM THE SEAGULL!

links.title: Endurance: "Own it! Steal hot dogs, shit in the..."
links.text: Own it! Steal hot dogs, shit in the sand -- whatever it takes to keep going!

links.title: You: "I guess I *am* a bit like the seagu..."
links.text: I guess I *am* a bit like the seagull.

links.title: Endurance: "Exactly. The seagull does what it t..."
links.text: Exactly. The seagull does what it takes -- and so do you. You've got that same spirit in you. When the time comes, you'll push yourself.

links.title: You: "But I'm not like that! I'm still ro..."
links.text: But I'm not like that! I'm still romantic.

links.title: Endurance: "Sure, *inside*. But outside it's a..."
links.text: Sure, *inside*. But outside it's a tough world. You've got to do whatever it takes to survive. And you *do*. Question is: will you admit that to yourself?

links.title: You: "Okay... well, let me re-consider."
links.text: Okay... well, let me re-consider.

links.title: Endurance: "Good boy."
links.text: Good boy.

links.title: You: "I will not, no. [Finish thought.]"
links.text: I will not, no. [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "Um... me?"
links.text: Um... me?

links.title: Endurance: "Exactly!"
links.text: Exactly!

links.title: You: "Kim?"
links.text: Kim?

links.title: Endurance: "What? Kim? No, it's you! You! You a..."
links.text: What? Kim? No, it's you! You! You and the seagull are just alike!

links.title: You: "I'm not going to have a seagull con..."
links.text: I'm not going to have a seagull conversation. [Finish thought.]
